summary: "TAKATA RECALL" RECEIVE NOTICE OF RECALL FOR AIRBAG INFLATOR DEFECT ON PASSENGER SIDE OF VEHICLE ABOUT 8 OR 10 MONTHS AGO. STILL WAITING FOR REPLACEMENT PART AND IT'S EXCEEDING WAY BEYOND TIME IS SHOULD HAVE BE REMEDIED. RECEIVED SECOND NOTICE ON APRIL 21, 2017. SPOKE TO SALES PERSON ON APRIL 25, 2017 AN WAS TOLD THAT PART IS NOT IN AND THEY ARE WAITING ON THE PARTS FROM MANUFACTURED. MY FATHER IN LAW DRIVES A HONDA AND HAD A RECALL ON THE SAME PART FROM "TAKATA" BUT RECEIVED HIS PART WITHIN A MONTH OR TWO. NOT THIS WAS EIGHT MONTHS AGO. NOW I'M STILL WAITING AND NOT HAVING ANY OF MY FAMILY RIDE IN THE PASSENGER SEAT BECAUSE OF THE DANGER IT IMPOSES. IT SEEMS NOTHING BUT NOTICE ARE BEING GIVE WITH NO RESOLUTION BEING DONE. ITS BECOMING EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. SINCE I CANNNOT DRIVE MY CAR WITH MY FAMILY IN THE FRONT SEAT IS POSSIBLE TO GET A LOANER CAR TO USE.
